14d7fe9d60cadc281ec961ffc609a3d65c3ef8bd.query: INSERT INTO relays(url) VALUES (?) ON CONFLICT(url) DO NOTHING

581c9bdc7a76a831276f55ec43bac4c2faef7e8d.query:
SELECT event, (unixepoch('now') - unixepoch(nip05_verified)) / 3600 AS "nip05_hours: u16"
FROM metadata
WHERE author = ?

5f8493e81f7cb2eb8cccc49522c237b7557bd46a.query:
SELECT (unixepoch('now') - unixepoch(nip05_verified)) / 60 / 60 AS "hours?: u32"
FROM metadata WHERE author = ?

82b4c37a52dca01fef7840835c4eece80e261302.query:
INSERT INTO relays(url, information, updated)
VALUES (?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
ON CONFLICT(url) DO UPDATE SET
  information = EXCLUDED.information,
  updated = EXCLUDED.updated

c1649e400797f9eb38cd710b5d759c30d7b82d6c.query:
INSERT INTO metadata (author, event) VALUES (?, ?)
ON CONFLICT (author) DO UPDATE SET event = EXCLUDED.event

d91c36934b68cebc69ef679d429c617978a15afe.query:
SELECT
  url,
  information IS NULL OR unixepoch('now') - unixepoch(updated) > 60 * 60 AS "old: bool"
FROM relays

f1d221a16deb319fc3058ce991331f39d59d509a.query:
UPDATE metadata SET nip05_verified = datetime('now')
WHERE author = ?
